div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 290 Delos, 1906 (308) Burial: c. 125-120 B.C. (T); c. 88 (Hackens) Contents: 40 AR. Pot hoard from excavations Athens: 19 New Style tetradr. 13 New Style dr. 7 New Style triob. Pergamum: 1 cist. (c. 125 B.C.) Disposition: Athens Svoronos, JIAN 1907, pp. 192-3 † Thompson, Athens (Delos Κς), pp. 481-2 Lewis, NC 1962, p. 280 Hackens, BCH 1965, p. 516
